Articles.Content:
Freddy Krueger kills you in your sleep.

My hill.
I kill him with my guns from earlier.

I stab megatiger78 in the back, and build impenetrable defenses.

My impenetrable hill.

Your hill is taken by rocket scientists and used as landing gear.

My hill on another planet.

I plant a flag on the planet.

My planet. And hill.

I nuke the hill.

My radioactive hill.
I use wizard magic to remove the radiation from the hill and transform it into an invincible castle. My radiation-free wizard fortress.

I build a new hill.

My new hill.

I dig a fortress into your hill.

My old hill fortress.

I plant a flag on the hill.

My old hill fortress.

I plant a plant on the hill.

My pea-shooter and fortress.

You never claimed the fortress and so I fight out of it and take the hill back.

My pea-shooter, fortress, and hill.

I bomb everything.

My burnt hill.
I bomb nothing. my hill

My Flareon Army captures It while listening to this song:

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/V92OBNsQgxU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

My hill inhabited by Flareon watchdogs listening to Ride of the Valkyries.
My *Mando* army takes it seeing as the hill is on mandlaore. maldlorian-contoled hill
The United Earth Intergalactic Assembly did i really have to say it's full name? captures the hill using super duper mega ultra 1337 technology.

I hire the Mandalornion army... or what's left of it, and convince it to go get everyone they can and storm the hill.

My hill. And Mando Army.

I shell the army from orbit and you with it.

my hill

I Nuke you and the hill from orbit.

My radioactive, smouldering hillish crater

Who the hell are you? Anyways...

I take the hill before you.

My hill while I'm 1v1ing Spearka.

EDIT: DAMMIT I WAS NINJAD

I build a hill.

My hill.
I take it apart. my lack of hill

I build another hill.

My hill.
I bulldoze you off the hill. My hill.
